com.unvired.ump.agent.context

Interface IApplication


  • public interface IApplication
    The interface IApplication provides access to the application context in the process agent.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getClientApplicationVersion()
      Gets the applications version from the posting device
      java.lang.String getClientFrameworkVersion()
      Gets the frameworks version from the posting device
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Gets the description of the application
      java.util.List<IFrontend> getFrontends()
      Gets the frontends applicable for the application
      IGroup getGroup(java.lang.String groupName)
      Gets a reference to the IGroup interface for a valid group name
      java.util.List<IGroup> getGroups()
      Gets a list of all groups with aleast one user for whom the application is deployed
      java.util.Date getInstallationDate()
      Gets the installation date of the application
      java.util.List<ILogicalSystem> getLogicalSystems()
      Gets the logical systems associated with the application
      java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the name of the application
      java.util.List<IProperty> getProperties()
      Gets the application properties
      IUser getUser(java.lang.String userName)
      Gets a reference to the IUser interface for a valid user name
      java.util.List<IUser> getUsers()
      Gets a list of all users for whom the application is deployed
      java.lang.String getVendor()
      Gets the vendor of the application
